what_is_section.h2: What Is Tankless Water Heater Installation?
what_is_section.body: A tankless water heater is a type of water heater that heats water only when needed, eliminating the need for a storage tank. This type of water heater is ideal for homes with multiple occupants, as it provides a continuous supply of hot water. In Carnelian Bay, CA, where water conservation is a priority, tankless water heaters are a great option. They also reduce energy consumption and last longer than traditional tank-style water heaters.
